title: Arkon Camera Bike Motorcycle Handlebar Mount Holder for Sony PowerShot Samsung NX1100 Smart Panasonic LUMIX Nikon COOLPIX
description: Arkon’s CMP227 bicycle or motorcycle handlebar mount fits all small digital cameras with the standard 1/4”-20 camera pattern, including the Sony PowerShot A2500 and NEX-3NL/B, Fujifilm X-T1, Samsung NX1100 Smart, Olympus OM-D E-M1, Panasonic LUMIX, and Nikon COOLPIX. This mount package includes Arkon’s Bicycle/Motorcycle Handlebar Mount with 1/4”-20 camera bolt. The mount fits on bicycle or motorcycle handlebars measuring up to 33mm in diameter and is easy to install with a Phillips screwdriver. (Three handlebar spacer/adapter rings of different widths are also included with the mount. Choose the appropriate size for optimum mounting to your handlebar.) To install the camera, just screw it onto the mount and secure with the tightening ring. The mount’s swivel ball adapter head rotates 360°, providing the ultimate flexibility in viewing the camera from any angle. It’s a versatile camera mount you can use to easily capture photos or video on your motorcycle or bicycle ride.
